title: Pizza Vegana - Puan
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, International, Italian, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: A 100% vegan take-out and delivery pizza place where you can also get gluten free pizzas, fainas and mini quiches. Pizzas are made with an artisan vegan potato cheese in a variety of flavors (olives and oregano, lentils and aioli, napolitana, mushrooms, bell peppers, vegan bolognaise and others). Opened August 2015.
